Body.Content:
This message is for your information and to ensure the best high audio and video quality experience during Microsoft Teams calls and meetings.

What you can do to prepare:

Please make sure you allow access to the following URL https://aiinfrastructure.static.microsoft/ to all users, as per ID 184 in Microsoft 365 URLs and IP address ranges.

This is especially important for the Noise Suppression feature that is a default experience for all users.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: The message informs about ensuring optimal audio and video quality during Microsoft Teams calls by allowing access to a specific URL as part of the preparation for the Noise Suppression feature.

Title: Ensuring Enhanced Noise Suppression and other advanced features work as expected
